item.title: Tik Tok Content Editor / Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor to make tik tok videos for me.
I pay 7 per video and want to do 1 trial video to see how you do. I have included channels to mimic/ copy, if you have expertise in horror/ scary niche please apply

-At least 1 minute long
-Engaging good videos
- You come up with the script, mimic from other videos and make the content with AI and some videos if you want

Examples:
https://www.tiktok.com/@urbanamerica
https://www.tiktok.com/@urbenamerica
https://www.tiktok.com/@secretscarystories

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 04:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Content Creation, Video Production, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Video Editing, Content Creation, Video Production, Social Media Content Creation
Country: United States

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a high quality long form video editor

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative YouTube Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for video editing, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to bring ideas to life through engaging and visually appealing content

Responsibilities:
Edit and assemble recorded footage into a finished project that aligns with the vision and goals of the YouTube channel.
Ensure the quality, consistency, and accuracy of the final video product.
Collaborate with content creators and provide creative input for video projects.
Stay updated on industry trends and implement new editing techniques to enhance video content.
Manage and organize video assets, ensuring efficient and effective workflow.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing previous work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Creative mindset with a strong understanding of storytelling and pacing.
Strong attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Knowledge of YouTube platform and content trends is a plus.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 04:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Conversion, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing
Skills: Color Grading, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Conversion, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video to Shorts Conversion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled freelancer who can help us convert our YouTube videos into Shorts. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and be familiar with the YouTube Shorts platform. This project involves turning our existing YouTube videos into shorter clips, optimizing them for the Shorts format, and adding engaging captions and relevant hashtags. The freelancer should have a good understanding of video optimization techniques, be able to work efficiently to meet deadlines, and have a creative eye for creating visually appealing Shorts. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering high-quality Shorts that are engaging and can drive traffic to our YouTube channel.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 03:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Wedding Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a passionate video editor with experience editing South Asian wedding videos. These videos require understanding the feel and energy of the couple/family and incorporating that into the final product. We believe in creating a story for our audience to have the full experience. We are looking for someone that has a good turnaround time, edits with final cut pro, knows cinematic colour grading, audio enhancement, and follows instructions clearly. If you are interested and think you can help, please feel free to apply.

Budget: $150

Category: Video Editing

item.description:

item.title: Video Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR

Do you have a passion for transforming complex stories into captivating videos?
Are you a skilled editor with a keen eye for detail and a talent for crafting engaging narratives?

If you thrive in a dynamic environment and enjoy working on a variety of projects, then GEDON™ Recruitment, a leading executive recruitment agency, wants to hear from you!
We're seeking an ambitious editor to join our growing team.

You'll play a vital role in developing and editing compelling video content across formats, helping us attract to reach the mission of becoming a global brand.


Our Mission:
GEDON™ Recruitment is dedicated to fill the talent gap in the preconstruction industry, and we believe the power of storytelling is exactly what will get us there.

By now we have a podcast with over 145 episodes, over 30,000 followers on LinkedIn and a reputation of a young company making waves 🌊🌊
So… this is the PERFECT OPPORTUNITY  for someone to have the creative freedom to experiment and contribute fresh ideas.

The right person can build an amazing portfolio!

We don’t expect you to know it all, rather than you are willing to learn and try with us!


Responsibilities:
Short-Form Video Editing:
Edit and refine short-form video content for various platforms (social media, website)
Utilize captivating visuals, music, and sound effects to enhance audience engagement
Ensure clear and concise messaging that resonates with our target audience (executives, hiring managers)
Long-Form Video Editing (Future Projects):
As we expand our video content strategy, you'll have the opportunity to contribute to longer-form video projects, such as training material or company videos.
Technical Skills:
Proficient in video editing software (Capcut, Premiere, Davinci, Canva)
Strong understanding of video editing principles and storytelling techniques
Graphic design skills
Additional Skills:
Familiarity with social media platforms and current video trends (a plus)
Initiative, if you think an idea could work, we can make it happen
Ability to meet deadlines and work independently


Samples of what we are looking for:


Short Form:
https://www.tiktok.com/@ejannnm/video/7264955916087348481?q=alex%20hormozi%20edit&t=1718763967740
https://www.tiktok.com/@ejannnm/video/7264955916087348481?q=alex%20hormozi%20edit&t=1718763967740
https://www.tiktok.com/@takumi.shyegun/video/7288%20654241965575432?q=how%20to&t=1718764149388



Long Form
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Abi8kwkfZbA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2VP64Tc60w


We are in the process of changing our website and general look and feel, so its the perfect mement to jump on and see growth happen.


Check more about us:

www.gedonexecutive.com
@gedonexecutive

Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 03:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, TikTok Video, Digital Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Film Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Instagram, TikTok
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, TikTok Video, Digital Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Film Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Instagram, TikTok
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Creator Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator to produce a [6] minute video using approximately 300 still photos and a soundtrack of 3 songs that we have already selected. The presentation of the photos should be synced to the music subtly when helpful to the storytelling/pacing of the video, and the transition from song to song should be thoughtful and creative.  Given the desired length of the video, you'll be excerpting from the 3 songs.

We have the order of the photos already.  We have the order for the songs.  So, we just need someone incredibly talented to pull it all together.  Once the video is in near-final form, we can provide copy for simple titles/labels (just places and dates) to be placed at various points in the video using just a simple, documentary style format.

The video should be fun and upbeat (the songs are from Coolio and The Talking Heads).  Looking for use of the "Ken Burns effect" at times, but nothing over-produced.  Keep the visuals classy and documentary style, but  video should be fast-paced and engaging.

The video will be used for non-commercial purposes only.  Shared with friends and family only.

The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and be able to bring our vision to life. Attention to detail is crucial, as we want the transitions between photos and songs to be creative and thoughtful. This project requires creativity, organization, and a strong understanding of storytelling through visuals and music.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 03:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics Video Editor needed for VSL - Upwork
item.description:
THE MAIN TASK:
- I actually need an editor specializing in motion graphics to create social media ads just like/better than these two:
https://app.foreplay.co/share/ads/kr0C2CJhLZteLPL7SUmA?user=Dan%20Ragan
https://f.io/P9eesoMR

Serious candidates only, your line of editing has to look like/better than this vertical video for social media.
Must need experience in this niche, or a high confidence level for pulling this off.




------
THE OPPORTUNITY
- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for editing VSL's for me.

WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 03:17 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Elements, DaVinci Resolve
Skills: Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Elements, DaVinci Resolve
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
